statements: SELECT * FROM location_data
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data
SELECT id, address FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 0
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE id < 10
SELECT address, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY address DESC
SELECT id, address, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE address LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC;
SELECT id, latitude FROM location_data WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40 AND 60 AND longitude BETWEEN -100 AND -80;
SELECT address FROM location_data WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM network_coverage ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, provider_name, coverage_strength FROM locations INNER JOIN network_coverage ON locations.location_id = network_coverage.location_id;
SELECT location_name, provider_name, coverage_strength FROM network_coverage INNER JOIN locations ON network_coverage.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE coverage_strength > 50;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_name = 'New York'
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id > 100 ORDER BY location_id DESC
SELECT l.location_name, nc.coverage_strength FROM locations l JOIN network_coverage nc ON l.location_id = nc.location_id WHERE nc.provider_name = 'Verizon'
SELECT location_name AS name, CONCAT(latitude, ',', longitude) AS coordinates FROM locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 0 AND longitude BETWEEN -180 AND 0

SELECT location_name, provider_name, coverage_strength FROM locations l INNER JOIN network_coverage nc ON l.location_id = nc.location_id WHERE coverage_strength > 80 ORDER BY location_name ASC, coverage_strength DESC
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, coverage_status FROM service_providers WHERE coverage_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, signal_strength FROM network_coverage WHERE cell_id = 100 ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT provider_name, coverage_status FROM service_providers WHERE coverage_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM network_coverage WHERE signal_strength > 50 ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC;

SELECT location_data.location_name, network_coverage.cell_id, service_providers.provider_name FROM location_data JOIN network_coverage ON location_data.id = network_coverage.id JOIN service_providers ON network_coverage.id = service_providers.id;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name,latitude,longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT network_name,technology,bandwidth FROM networks WHERE bandwidth > 100;

SELECT locations.location_name, networks.network_name, signal_value FROM locations INNER JOIN coverage_areas ON locations.location_id = coverage_areas.location_id INNER JOIN networks ON networks.network_id = coverage_areas.network_id ORDER BY network_name, location_name;
SELECT network_name, COUNT(*) AS total_coverage_areas FROM networks JOIN coverage_areas ON networks.network_id = coverage_areas.network_id GROUP BY network_name HAVING total_coverage_areas > 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude < 0
SELECT network_name, technology FROM networks ORDER BY network_name
SELECT coverage_range, location_name FROM coverage_areas INNER JOIN locations ON coverage_areas.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY coverage_range DESC
SELECT network_name, AVG(bandwidth) AS avg_bandwidth FROM networks INNER JOIN coverage_areas ON networks.network_id = coverage_areas.network_id GROUP BY network_name HAVING avg_bandwidth > 100
SELECT location_name, signal_value FROM signal_strength INNER JOIN coverage_areas ON signal_strength.coverage_id = coverage_areas.coverage_id WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY signal_value ASC
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT operator, coverage_type, coverage_area FROM network_coverage WHERE technology='5G';
SELECT * FROM signal_strength WHERE location_id='a58c504b-24f6-4ac6-806f-8eb19b1430c9' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT operator_name, country FROM network_operators WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM locations LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT l.location_name, nc.operator, nc.technology, nc.coverage_type FROM locations l JOIN network_coverage nc ON l.location_id = nc.location_id;
SELECT max(signal_strength), min(signal_strength), AVG(signal_strength) FROM signal_strength;
